column1: Proud of my friend @DrRandyFriese for winning re-election! You have done such incredible work for Arizona especially amidst the pandemic and I cannot wait to continue working alongside you to improve the lives of Southern Arizonans. #LD9 (pre-COVID picture) https://t.co/ufwteJaPZS

Congratulations to my friend @EngelForArizona on her win yesterday! Kirsten is a fierce advocate for quality public education environmental protection a better-serving economy and a fairer criminal justice system. I can't wait to continue working with her! (Pre-Covid picture) https://t.co/cWIgizVhQL

We cannot let our guards down. COVID-19 is still out there and is still dangerous.   Stay home as much as possible wash your hands and wear a mask when you must leave the house. 😷#MaskUpAZ  https://t.co/K2KtJSFJyK

We all want our lives & the economy to return to normal — but we can't achieve that until we get #COVID19 under control. This means:  ✅ Financial relief for families ✅ Loans for small businesses  ✅ Support for frontline workers   We'll get it done—together. #Vote4AZ  #VoteBlue
Too many families have lost a loved one to COVID-19. This is a disease that doesn't discriminate — we need to come together & meet this moment.    #MaskUpAZ
We each have a role in stopping the spread of COVID-19. Together we can get through this! #MaskUpAZ https://t.co/E1lEWiXafz

5632 Arizonans are dead from #COVID19.  200000 Americans are dead. 7 million are infected in the US.   Instead of talking tax returns & tweets Americans are starving for leadership. The choice is clear. #Biden2020 #Debates2020
COVID-19 is still a threat!   Stay socially distant🧍‍♂️↔️ 🧍‍♂️ Wash your hands thoroughly 🧼 Wear a mask in public & when with others 😷   #MaskUpAZ https://t.co/GikmEsl9zX

COVID-19 disproportionately affects America's Hispanic & Latino population — but instead of rolling out a national pandemic strategy the President is busy campaigning...for the votes of the very people he is failing to serve while currently in office.   https://t.co/M2nZS7xPvH

Our country is facing a series of challenges — the COVID-19 pandemic a collapsing economy and racial inequality. But if history proves one thing it's that when we stand united we can overcome anything. @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris understand that and they will #BuildBackBetter.

Arizona: our daily numbers are still alarming. Please wear a mask. Practice social distancing. Take this virus seriously. We all play a part in preventing the spread of #COVID19.   https://t.co/DWvmaynouH

Changing up the system in the middle of a crisis isn't a strategy — it is a recipe for disaster and will worsen our current situation. Once again this administration will not listen to experts. #COVID19  https://t.co/ctezxBMY6R
This 4th of July you are safest at home. We have been witnessing a scary rise in COVID-19 cases; don't go adding to it by attending mass gatherings this weekend.

#COVID19 doesn't care that it's a holiday weekend — if you aren't careful you will risk getting sick & getting others sick. The more we work to slow the spread the sooner we can return to normalcy. It's up to us.

The number of infections in Arizona surpassed 79000 yesterday and the state reported 1632 deaths. Today the numbers are exponentially higher.   Take this virus seriously. Wear a mask. Demonstrate that you care. #COVID19

This virus is not going to go away on its own — we need to be vigilant and cooperative to get through it. Please wear your mask stay home as much as possible and avoid close encounters with others! #COVID19
Arizona: we hit a record number of COVID-caused deaths today. Please wear a mask show respect to others' health and stay socially distanced! #COVID19

To Trump campaigning is paramount. He only cares about power — not people. Otherwise why would he be visiting a state that has made nat'l news for record Covid-19 cases and NOT follow CDC guidelines at a 3000 person rally? https://t.co/jg9jgbakjL

Just a few days after admitting he slowed down testing Trump is visiting AZ where COVID-19 cases and deaths are surging. He is unabashed in his priorities and is singlehandedly costing American families' lives and livelihoods. #VoteHimOut
Remember: the COVID-19 incubation period is anywhere between 2-14 days. Get tested use common sense and follow CDC guidelines!  We must all fight together against this virus. #COVID19

Regardless of the lies Donald Trump is telling us and himself our economy is suffering because of lack of leadership in the face of the coronavirus Americans need help not meaningless boasts. https://t.co/NqemKGrPWR
Arizona reopened too early and now we're reaping the consequences. #COVID-19  https://t.co/C59BWfgX3l
Science is science: staying at home really does save lives. Arizonans — remember that we each have a role in stopping the spread! #COVID-19  https://t.co/NTDuEtuKPM

Arizona's coronavirus cases are exponentially increasing — and we're running out of ICU beds. Please exercise caution & stay home whenever you can. The pandemic hasn't disappeared!  #COVID-19   https://t.co/RuEJeQiD4z

Our President has his priorities:   ❌100K+ Americans dead from COVID-19 = no action ❌ Rampant police brutality = condoned encouraged  ✅Twitter fact-checking and hiding his tweets = Executive Order outcry.   #VoteHimOut

Now more than ever we must support the health workers on the front lines. On a small scale it means wearing a mask in public for the safety of yourself & others but on a large scale it means demanding a better strategy from our government. #COVID19 https://t.co/d5K8ZlB9ij

Contrary to popular belief there was no "miracle" and COVID-19 did not just "disappear." Please stay socially distant follow CDC guidelines and treat others the way you want to be treated. https://t.co/TnzRr8aJmQ https://t.co/xwdb3IIyGy

Scientists agree: Arizona will likely see a second wave of coronavirus cases in the coming months. Please practice safe measures such as wearing a mask and staying socially distant from others. https://t.co/bklu7PA8Hv

Very proud of the efforts of the Navajo and Hopi Family COVID-19 Relief Fund — together they raised $4 million since March. The volunteer-led group provides essential items to families on the Navajo and Hopi reservations. Thank you for your service. https://t.co/E1Boz2DpVo
While the world & our country gets swept up with coronavirus this administration has been busy slashing environmental protections.  This is totally unacceptable:   https://t.co/6eUxIxXmGc

The #ACA is best positioned to respond to the #COVID19 crisis. We simply cannot let Republicans and the current Administration continue their attempts to gut it. It's time to act like real leaders and help struggling Americans not harm them. #DropTheLawsuit #ProtectOurCare
President Trump botched our country’s response to coronavirus.  His ‘visits’ are poor attempts to campaign for his re-election.  https://t.co/gl7rtTIy7W

Some great work is coming out of my Alma Mater @uarizona! These wildcats are initiating projects to better understand the coronavirus and the impacts it has on people. Thank you for your work and dedication to helping the community! 🐻⬇️https://t.co/GEwgN9jse8
When will Arizona hit the COVID-19 peak? Models disagree about “when“ but not about “if.”  Please continue to stay home so we can continue flattening the curve!   https://t.co/yBv2DVeeSu

If Trump wants to #ReopenAmerica for business he needs to remember that our economy is propelled by immigrants. Issuing another #ImmigrationBan should not be the priority right now. Instead he should help medical professionals get PPE and ramp up widespread testing. #COVID19

What’s the difference between President Trump medical doctors and scientists?   Doctors & scientists know more than the President about containing pandemics. Make sure your information comes from credible sources. #COVID19
Things Trump has eliminated so far:  ✅  The White House Pandemic Response Team ✅  A pandemic early-warning program designed to detect coronaviruses  ✅  75% of the national medical supply stockpile
If we've learned anything from this crisis it's that our essential workers deserve advocacy and they deserve it now. #RealHeroes #COVID19
Feeling behind on updates? Remember many major news publishers have put their coronavirus coverage in front of their paywalls. Stay at home and stay informed! #COVID19

Attention University of Arizona students! In light of recent changes due to COVID-19 the UA Campus Pantry — which provides meals to food insecure students — has new distribution days times and location.  Distance yourself responsibly and make sure to wash those hands! https://t.co/6jP8f9x0DN

The spread of coronavirus is scary and it can come with even more harrowing consequences — surprise medical bills.   We must work to ensure coverage for those with pre-existing conditions and we must work against Trump’s ACA rollbacks. https://t.co/ho4llGTOih
